feed.title: Mirion Technologies (NYSE: MIR) enters $450M 2032 term loan refinancing
feed.summary: Mirion Technologies (NYSE: MIR) has refinanced its term loans by entering into a new $450 million tranche of term loans maturing on June 5, 2032. This amendment to their Credit Agreement uses the new "Replacement Term Loans," along with other cash, to effectively refinance all outstanding term loans. The new loans feature an applicable margin that can be reduced based on Mirion's corporate credit ratings from Moody's and S&P, and include a 1% prepayment premium under certain repricing conditions.

feed.title: Mirion Completes Acquisition of Paragon Energy Solutions
feed.summary: Mirion (NYSE: MIR), a global provider of radiation detection and monitoring solutions, has completed its acquisition of Paragon Energy Solutions, a leading provider of engineered solutions for the nuclear power industry. This acquisition enhances Mirion's offerings, strengthens its position in the nuclear sector, and integrates Paragon's engineering expertise and solutions into Mirion's Nuclear & Safety Group. The combined entity aims to provide a more comprehensive suite of products and services to nuclear power customers, supporting both the existing fleet and emerging small modular reactors (SMRs).

feed.title: Why Mirion Technologies Stock Blasted Nearly 11% Higher Today
feed.summary: Mirion Technologies (NYSE: MIR) stock surged nearly 11% today due to several financing announcements and a positive analyst outlook. The company set pricing for a secondary stock issue raising nearly $370 million and upsized a convertible senior notes offering to $325 million. These funds will primarily support the acquisition of nuclear engineering specialist Paragon Energy Solutions for approximately $585 million.

feed.title: $585M Nuclear Power Deal: Mirion Acquires Paragon to Dominate U.S. Nuclear Plant Solutions Market
feed.summary: Mirion (NYSE: MIR) has announced a definitive agreement to acquire Paragon Energy Solutions for approximately $585 million in cash. This acquisition aims to broaden Mirion's offerings for nuclear power customers, including Small Modular Reactors (SMRs), and is expected to be accretive to diluted EPS within the first full year post-acquisition, generating $10 million in commercial and cost synergies annually by year five. The deal strengthens Mirion's position as a global supplier to the nuclear industry and enhances service offerings for both operating nuclear fleets and next-generation SMR projects.

feed.title: Mirion Technologies announces $350 million public offering of shares
feed.summary: Mirion Technologies, Inc. announced a public offering of $350 million in Class A common stock and a concurrent $250 million convertible notes offering. The proceeds from both offerings will primarily fund the acquisition of WCI-Gigawatt Intermediate Holdco, LLC and related capped call transactions. The company's stock has surged 134% over the past year, trading near its 52-week high.

feed.title: First-Ever Corporate Partnership: Radiation Safety Leader Mirion Teams with IAEA to Transform Global Nuclear Safety
feed.summary: Mirion (NYSE: MIR) has partnered with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) to enhance global radiation safety through cooperation in detection and measurement. This collaboration, which marks Mirion as the first corporation to enter a Practical Arrangement with the IAEA TERC Laboratory, will leverage Mirion's advanced instrumentation and expertise to support IAEA initiatives, including training, capacity building, and sample analysis. The partnership aims to advance the safe and secure use of nuclear technology worldwide, strengthening capabilities in radiation safety and security globally.
